CustomField.description:
NOT ACTIVE
Rollup of the frequent role found on related Retool User records for all orgs. - Synced every 24 hours - Retool Org Subscription Type == 'Committed' - Excludes churned committed customers: Account Status (Committed) != 'Former Customer' - Excludes Retool Users that haven't `logged in` in the last 90 days
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rollup of the frequent role found on related Retool User records for all orgs.
CustomField.label: Max Role At All Orgs
